summary: Diff shows partial changes to DiagnosticsBar plus modifications to buildExport/zipWriter, but the key ZIP-export removal cannot be verified from the truncated/omitted content. Some non-product metadata files were also modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the ZIP build export feature from the UI by deleting the "Build Export" section in the Diagnostics bar, including the download button, progress text, and the deployment instructions that reference downloading/extracting a ZIP.
missing_requirements.reason: DiagnosticsBar.tsx is truncated and the diff summary does not show removal of a "Build Export" section or elimination of ZIP-related UI text; cannot confirm the card/section and related copy were removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the underlying ZIP export implementation so the frontend no longer generates or downloads ZIP files, including removing the usage of exportFrontendBuild/downloadBlob and any ZIP writer logic that is only used for this export.
missing_requirements.reason: buildExport.ts and zipWriter.ts are listed as modified, but their content is not shown. The DiagnosticsBar snippet also does not show whether ZIP-export-related imports/references were removed. Therefore cannot verify that ZIP Blob generation paths and related imports are fully removed or unused imports are resolved.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/metadata file (project_state.json) to add/mark feature requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to project_state.json; this is not part of removing ZIP export from the app UI/implementation.
BuildRequest did not request updating documentation/summary artifacts; not necessary to implement ZIP export removal.
